rooms.description: Large open-plan space with Mediterranean-style decor, incorporating floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light. The design adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the entrance in the south-east direction, ensuring energy flow.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with integrated island counter and built-in storage. The layout is designed for wheelchair accessibility with wide doorways and low countertops.

Spacious master bedroom designed with soft Mediterranean hues, floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, and a private balcony. Vastu principles ensure that the bed is positioned in the south-west direction.
Modern bathroom with accessible fixtures designed for wheelchair access. The design incorporates a walk-in shower and grab bars, ensuring safety and comfort.
Compact servant’s quarters providing privacy and functional space. The layout adheres to Indian residential norms while offering essential amenities for the caretaker.

Open balcony that serves as an outdoor relaxation area, with Mediterranean landscaping and seating arrangements. This space promotes airflow and complies with Vastu by being positioned in the north-east direction.

openings.description: Large, wheelchair-accessible entrance door following Vastu principles. The door is designed with Mediterranean aesthetics and security features.
Door leading from the living area to the balcony/patio, providing seamless outdoor access while ensuring privacy.
Wide kitchen entrance door designed for easy wheelchair movement and efficient flow between spaces.
Discreet access point to the servant’s quarters, ensuring privacy while maintaining functionality.
